name: cooling_thermostat_setpoint_occ_red_by_outdoor_temp
display_name: Cooling Thermostat Setpoint Occ Red by Outdoor Temp

arguments.name: zone_choice
arguments.display_name: Enter the name of the zone

arguments.name: min_oa_tmp
arguments.display_name: Enter the minimum outdoor air temperature

arguments.name: offset_lvl
arguments.display_name: Enter the expected occupant offset to the thermostat

modeler_description: To use this Measure, choose the zone to be faulted. Enter the minimum outdoor temperature that the occupant will reduce the outdoor temperature manually and the offset that the occupant will impose on the thermostat.
description: This Measure offsets the thermostat cooling setpoint according to the outdoor temperature and to simulate the manual change of thermostat setpoint when outdoor temperature is higher than certain value and the building is occupied.
